description: Emergency and crisis resources for offline access
note: This file is cached for offline use. Always verify numbers before calling.

national_hotlines.name: Suicide & Crisis Lifeline
national_hotlines.description: Free, confidential support 24/7 for people in distress

national_hotlines.name: National Safety Hotline
national_hotlines.description: Support for individuals and families experiencing unsafe situations at home

national_hotlines.name: Crisis Text Line
national_hotlines.description: Free, 24/7 crisis support via text message

national_hotlines.name: Trevor Project
national_hotlines.description: Crisis intervention and suicide prevention for LGBTQ+ youth

national_hotlines.name: Trans Lifeline
national_hotlines.description: Peer support hotline run by and for trans people

national_hotlines.name: SAMHSA National Helpline
national_hotlines.description: Free, confidential treatment referral and information service

national_hotlines.name: Love Is Respect
national_hotlines.description: Support for young people ages 13-26 in relationships

national_hotlines.name: Childhelp National Child Abuse Hotline
national_hotlines.description: Crisis intervention for child abuse, available to children and adults

national_hotlines.name: RAINN
national_hotlines.description: Support for survivors of sexual violence

bay_area_crisis.name: Narika
bay_area_crisis.description: Culturally specific support in South Asian languages

bay_area_crisis.name: Maitri
bay_area_crisis.description: Culturally specific support in South Asian languages

bay_area_crisis.name: Family Justice Center
bay_area_crisis.description: One-stop center with legal, counseling, advocacy

safety_tips.tip: Use *67 before dialing to hide your caller ID
Text HOME to 741741 if you can't make a phone call safely
Use a friend's phone or library computer if your device is monitored
Clear your browser history after visiting sensitive websites
Check location sharing settings on your phone and family apps
Many hotlines offer online chat if phone calls aren't safe
Libraries offer free WiFi and phone charging
Ask about interpretation services if you prefer another language
